name: Advanced Battlegrounds: The Future of Combat
summary:
Advanced Battlegrounds: The Future of Combat is an expanded re-release of Chrome. It includes the following extra content:

New single-player missions (not integrated into the campaign)
Video tutorial for the editor
Soundtrack CD
Mouse pad
